The VIP tables end on the last day of the Quarter. On this day, all the balance VIP chips will be converted back to real cash chips automatically.
Tax Deduction: In case the VIP chip winnings are more than 10,000, tax shall be deducted when VIP chips are converted back to real cash chips.

Late registration allowed for 25 mins

- You can use this balance to Register/Re-Enter/Rebuy/Addon in Tournaments and SnGs.
- All new Purchases, Instant Bonus and Tournament Winnings will be credited to this wallet.
- To play Ring Games, you must transfer the balance from Poker Wallet to VIP Chips.
- You can end your VIP session and transfer VIP Chips to Poker Wallet anytime subject to deduction of appropriate TDS.
- You can use VIP chips to play on all Ring Game tables.

- While doing Buy-in for Ring Games, if you do not have enough VIP chips balance, system will automatically transfer the remaining required money from Poker Wallet to VIP chips to meet Buy-in criteria.
- When you Leave Seat, your remaining balance on the table will credit back to VIP chips.
